explanation: [0-0] A black-haired man in purple clothes is standing in front of purple and white curtains. The man in purple is wearing a mechanical glove on one hand. There is a piece of paper on the curtain with a sign prohibiting dry and chapped lips. There is a person on the right.

[0-8] At this moment, a blonde woman in a colorful top and blue pants comes over from the right, and the man in purple stops her. The woman in the colorful top looks at him in astonishment. The camera zooms in, and the man in purple pats the paper on the curtain. The woman in the colorful top touches her dry mouth in a panic. The man in purple looks at her with disgust, the camera zooms out, the man in purple stretches out his hand wearing a mechanical glove and pats the woman in the colorful top, and the woman in the colorful top disappears. The man in purple looks at the mechanical glove in shock. Then the camera zooms in, and the man in purple thinks of something and smiles.
